description:
Humans vs Tigers is not just a game; it's a test of your wit, reflexes, and determination. Gather your hunters, navigate intricate obstacle courses, and face the fearsome tiger. 
     Game Highlights:
   • 51 Challenging Levels: Conquer progressively intense adventures with growing obstacle complexity.
   • Masterful Obstacle Courses: Navigate various challenges, from swinging hammers to menacing knives, gathering your hunters.
   • Randomised Team Placement: Strategically position your team to ensure smooth progression.
   • Strategic Gameplay: Navigate obstacles with skill to reach the tiger alongside your team.
   • Unpredictable Challenges: Face new levels of excitement, with ever-changing obstacles, keeping you on the edge.
     Are you ready to lead your team to victory against all odds?
name: Humans vs Tigers
